name: Noisli
body:
# Improve focus and boost your productivity.
# Mix different sounds and create your perfect environment.

## ABOUT NOISLI

Noisli is here to make you more focused and boost your productivity. A background noise generator that helps you drown out annoying noises and that lets you create your perfect environment for working and relaxing. You can mix different sounds and create your perfect sound environment tailored to your personal need and taste.

## SELF-STARTED WITH PASSION

Noisli started as a side project in September 2013. At that time me and Sabine were working as freelance designers from home. It was hard to motivate ourselves and to not feel isolated since the environment around us was too silent and not inspiring. On the other hand, working in an office or co-working space is often too loud and has too many distractions. Thatâ€™s why we decided to create our own solution to the problem, Noisli.

## SIMPLICITY AND CARE FOR PEOPLE

At Noisli we love simplicity and details and we spent every day passioned about what we are doing. We are driven by our goal to create the best product possible and by the support of our users.We put people at the core of our work, and we want to build and grow Noisli around people and their needs. We want to solve a real problem and try to make the world a better place. 

Noisli is growing fast and is used already by 100.000 people every month from all over the world. We are always looking for great people, that are curious, truly passionate about what they are doing and that first of all care about the people. If you want to join a great team, just apply here.
